original_title: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION
overview: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION is Onitsuka Chihiro's first live DVD, and consists mostly of songs from her Insomnia era. Both versions of "Gekkou" sung were close to the album version arrangements, with the difference being that the first time singing the song she started acapella. It was shot at SHIBUYA-AX on April 28, 2001.
tagline: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION
title: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION
